description.text1: We are a family passionate about games and shared moments. Driven by the desire to create playful experiences accessible to all, we created Popep: a fun and original game for families, friends, and lovers.
description.text2: Through our cards, we hope to offer moments of connection, laughter, and cherished memories to those who enjoy spending quality time together.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Born from a simple 'I love you' turned into 'POPEP' by our son.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Create unforgettable moments of sharing among loved ones.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Make games accessible to everyone, in every language.

intro.text1: A card game designed for different audiences, with versions specifically adapted for couples, friends, long-distance relationships, and a special version for young parents.
intro.text2: Each version aims to foster communication, sharing, and closeness, allowing everyone to experience unique and enriching moments, whatever their relationship context.

couple.title: The Couple's Game - To (Re)Discover Each Other
couple.description: Even when you’ve loved each other for a long time, there are always new things to explore.
couple.longDescription: This game is an invitation to nourish intimacy, open dialogue, and strengthen understanding within the couple. Because love grows with both small gestures and deep conversations.

distance.title: The Long-Distance Game - To Get Closer Despite the Miles
distance.description: Nowadays, more and more couples are in long-distance relationships, temporarily or long term.
distance.longDescription: This game is made for them: a playful way to break routine and have fun together—even through a screen, a call, or a simple text. Because true love knows no distance.

postpartum.title: Love&Diapers - The Postpartum Special Game
postpartum.description: One in two couples struggles after the arrival of a child. Fatigue, emotions, upheaval...
postpartum.longDescription: This game is designed to help reconnect during this sensitive time. Sitting on the couch between feedings, you can still share important words — and most of all, keep loving each other.

friends.title: The Friends Game - For Those We Think We Already Know
friends.description: We think we know our friends well, but real conversations are often rare.
friends.longDescription: This game brings back the focus on confidences, memories, laughter, and sometimes surprises. Because it’s never too late to discover (or rediscover) those around us.

strengths.title: Our Strengths
strengths.subtitle: Highlight the authenticity of the game and its commitment to diversity and the environment.

expertise.title: Complementary Expertise
expertise.description: A team with diverse skills enriching the project, blending professional and personal experience to create a unique and engaging product.

passion.title: Passion and Authenticity
passion.description: A project born from a true love for human relationships, offering players authentic and meaningful experiences.

eco.title: Environmental Commitment
eco.description: A desire to minimize environmental impact through sustainable choices, both in game design and material selection.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: An inclusive design enabling everyone to take part—regardless of age, background, or orientation—ensuring everyone can enjoy moments of connection.
